rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An open area welcoming visitors with minimalistic design and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Lobby / Reception
rooms.description: A transitional space between the entrance and the main living areas.

rooms.name: Open Living/Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious area combining a modern dining setup and comfortable seating for relaxation.

rooms.name: Minimalist Kitchen
rooms.description: Streamlined kitchen design with modern appliances and efficient layout, incorporating Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Dual-car garage with ample space and secure storage.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Dedicated space for laundry and other household utilities.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom A
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample balcony space for morning views and Vastu-compliant orientation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom B
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with a private balcony and Vastu-aligned design.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large opening ensuring a welcoming entry with Vastu-aligned approach.

openings.name: Balcony Door (Master Bedroom)
openings.description: Open balcony door providing access to the master bedroom's private outdoor space.

openings.name: Balcony Door (Guest Bedroom)
openings.description: Open balcony door leading to the guest bedroom's private outdoor space.

openings.name: Garage Door
openings.description: Dual-opening garage door for convenient car access and adherence to Vastu guidelines on entry points.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom A (Upper)
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on the first floor with enhanced privacy and a balcony for relaxation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom B (Upper)
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom on the first floor with private balcony access and a Vastu-friendly layout.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom A
rooms.description: Well-equipped master bathroom ensuring comfort and privacy.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom B
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom designed with a minimalist approach.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Secure and elegantly designed staircase connecting the two floors.
